summary: This is a simple overwrite to completely delete all all health, stamina and magika restaure potions from the vanilla game.
descriptionHtml:
[u][i][center]NO POTIONS[/center][/i][/u]
This is my first mod so please be kind ! :)
A very simple mod I made from myself.
But after finding nothing on the nexus that did the same I decided to upload.
I love to play with mods that boost my food so they act as they where potions. Therefore I didn't wanted those potions in my gaming time since I always thought that they where way too common and powerful. They kinda break my lore.

I hope that any gamer with the will to be more survival / realistic will apreciate this.

Potions of restaure Health Magika and Stamina are completely ereased from the Skyrim masterfile.
[b]You can still make your own potions via alchemy.[/b]
I strongly recommend any mod that make food more useful like this oneÂ http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69650/? Lucid did a wonderful work please endorse his mod!
author: Hi_My_Name_Is_What
